::Hot Rod::

He chuckled.
"Just dont talk about Alliance stuff. Talk like you want to do good,
like a Maximal. Really just be polite, and nice."

OOC: Oops, I forgot the Fight!! part of my last post.

::DrillBit::

He looked at Dark Nouse. 
"Destructor got her out of here."
